## Example map

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```

## first 

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()


my_map
```

## Adding marker

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=39.2980803, lng=-76.5898801, 
             popup="Jeff Leek's Office")
my_map
```

## Add many markers


```{r}
library(leaflet)
set.seed(2016-04-25)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min=39.2, max = 39.3),
                 lng = runif(20, min=-76.6, max=-76.5))
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers()

```
